title: Is my Ethernet controller going?
body:
So this problem has ruined countless games for me and I'm either gonna buy a new Motherboard or a PCIE Ethernet card cause it's starting to piss me off.

Whenever I'm in a league game, (it doesn't ALWAYS happen) I will randomly disconnect, when I window out fast I can see that my network adapter has a red circle with an x kind of like nothing is plugged in, but it quickly turns back on and stays on for about maybe 2-4 seconds then does the same shit again. It lasts short to long, meaning it can either lose me a game or make it extremely hard. Thinking about just playing on my laptop till I figure out what the hell is wrong. The only time it does this is when I'm playing league.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like it can the adapter itself, but I'd recommend trying to update the driver off the manufacturer's website before trying another adapter.

Let me know if that caused any sort of change in what you're seeing.
